text:
최소한 자기의 신앙은 거짓말하지말길 바라며 혼자 끄적여봄
비신자들이야 종교고 뭐고 아무상관하지 않지만 적어도
본인이 기독교를 믿는다고 공개적으로 언급하고 싶다면
진짜 본인이 신앙생활 잘하고 있는지 돌아보길 바람
아니면 함부로 하나님의 자녀라고 말하고 다닌것부터가
종교적으로 죄가 될테니까 민희진이 무교라면 아무상관없지만
일단 기독교는 철저하게 유일신 여호와 라는 이름 앞에
그 어떤것도 신보다 우선시 할수없음 특히
성경을 한번이라도 읽은 사람은 알지만
성경전체에서 신점. 무당을 가까이 두는것을 경고하고 있음
기독교는 우상을 끔찍이도 싫어해서 술도 취하면 안되서 안먹고
교회다니는데 타로본다면 신앙심이 덜하다고 느낌
제사도 조상신이기때문에 지내는걸 꺼려하고
무당친구한테 위로를 받아? 여기서 끝남
민희진이 말하는 하나님이 감당할 시련을 준단건
성경에 나오는 구절이지만 해석을 저렇게 하면 큰일남
이단소리 들을수도 있음.
저 내용은 기독교적으로는 하나님이 자기를 더 믿도록
철이 더 단단해지게 담금질하고
부모가 자식을 사랑하지만 좀더 철들고 단단해지라고
자식 물가두고 뒤로는 지켜주려는 걸로 해석하는게
보통 기독교에서 말하는 해석임
->저건 하나님을 정말 잘 믿는 사람이 성경대로 다 살수없는걸 알고현실적으로 신앙중에 외롭고 힘들때 (저 당시에 기독교박해가 심한 시대였음)신이 완전히 망가뜨리려는 목적이 아니라 더 열심히 살라고 한번씩 자극을 주는 정도다 너무 좌절하지마라 이럴때일수록 더 기도하고 나아가란 의미임
trans:
I hope at least one doesn't lie about their own faith, and I'm writing this down on my own.
Non-believers may not care about religion but at the very least
if someone publicly claims to be Christian, I hope they reflect on whether they are truly living according to their faith
I hope they reflect on whether they are truly living according to their faith
Otherwise, just claiming to be a child of God without actually living that faith could be considered a sin from a religious standpoint
If Min Hee-jin is not religious, then it doesn't matter
but Christianity is firmly based on the belief in the one true God, Jehovah
and nothing can be prioritized over Him. Especially
For those who have read the Bible even once, they would know that throughout the Bible
there are warnings against seeking divination or associating with shamans
Christianity strongly opposes idolatry, and alcohol should also be avoided because one must not get drunk
If someone goes to church but also seeks tarot readings, it feels like they are lacking in true faith
They are reluctant to perform ancestral rites because they involve ancestral spirits
and they seek comfort from a shaman friend? That's where it ends
The statement Min Hee-jin made about God giving trials that one can endure is a verse from the Bible
but interpreting it that way could lead to serious problems
People might accuse her of being a cult leader.
From a Christian perspective, this concept is understood as God allowing challenges
to strengthen one’s faith and resolve
Parents love their children, but they let them face challenges in order to help them grow wiser and stronger
It is interpreted as a parent allowing their child to face challenges while still watching over them from behind
It is the interpretation commonly understood in Christianity
-> That was a time when even those who truly believed in God knew they couldn’t live perfectly according to the Bible (It was a time when Christian persecution was intense). God doesn’t allow trials with the intention of completely destroying a person but rather to give them occasional encouragement to live more diligently. The message is not to be overly discouraged. Instead, it’s a reminder to pray more and move forward, especially during such difficult times
